name: Atomium-European Institute for Science, Media and Democracy
legal: Belgian Association Internationale Sans But Lucratif
goal: Atomium-EISMD convenes leading European universities, media, businesses, governments and policymakers to increase the exchange of information and interdisciplinary collaboration, to develop innovative collaborative initiatives and to encourage frontier thinking about science, media and democracy. Atomium-EISMD was launched publicly by the former President of France Valery Giscard d'Estaing, Michelangelo Baracchi Bonvicini and by the leaders of the institutions engaged during the first conference on the 27 November 2009 at the European Parliament in Brussels.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: These are the main initiatives followed by our organization: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
